MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G78 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Braeside Drive and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1pm on Monday, 18 January 2021.
